senses.sense_definition: Relating to the ancient town of <w>Atella</w> in Italy.

examples.text: The <w>Atellan</w> farces were a popular form of entertainment in ancient Rome.
Historians study <w>Atellan</w> culture to understand the pre-Roman influences in the region.

senses.sense_definition: A type of ancient farcical drama associated with the town of <w>Atella</w>.

examples.text: The actors performed an <w>Atellan</w> using stock characters and masks.
Scholars believe the <w>Atellan</w> influenced the later development of commedia dell'arte.

traits.comment: refers to an ancient art form

examples.text: An <w>Atellan</w> would have spoken Oscan before the spread of Latin.
The <w>Atellans</w> were known for their distinctive theatrical traditions.
